message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-end product that I think you'll really love. I'm looking for $12000 for it. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Alice, your product sounds interesting, but $12000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9500. What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12000 might be a bit steep, but $9500 is still a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $11000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $11000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $10500. This is my final offer.

I understand you're willing to go up to $10500, Bob, but I was really hoping to get closer to my original price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, so I'll counteroffer at $10750. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher.
